quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Good Times and Line
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, ground, seinfeld. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Holding his hand to his heart he would almost fall to the ground and say Elizabeth, Im coming! whenever someone did something he didnt like.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fred Sanford

questions.question: Michael Evans, the youngest member of the Evans family from the series Good Times, was portrayed by which actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ralph Carter

questions.question: On the show Good Times, Thelmas husband Keith had a knee injury which halted his career as a football player. After his full recovery, he was offered a contract by what NFL team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicago Bears

questions.question: This comedian, who was in a comedy team with his brother, would say, Mom always liked you best.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tommy Smothers

questions.question: Which character from a 1970s TV show said Up your nose with a rubber hose ?

options.text: Juan Luis Pedro Phillipo de Huevos Epstein

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vinnie Barbarino

questions.question: J. J. Evans, a character from the show Good Times, became famous with which catchphrase?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dy-no-mite

questions.question: This detective had Just one more thing.... to ask, usually seemingly irrelevant to the case.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Columbo

questions.question: What was the name of Florida Evans best friend and neighbour in the TV series Good Times?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Willona

questions.question: What was the name of the building superintendent, portrayed by Johnny Brown, who joined the cast of  Good Times during the 1977 season?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nathan Bookman

questions.question: The line , “…if it weren’t for you meddling kids! , was in nearly every episode.  of which show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scooby Doo

questions.question: Neil Armstrong actually flubbed his famous words, delivered when he landed on the moon, which rendered the phrase contradictory.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The co-creator of Seinfeld, Larry David, supplied the voice of the eccentric owner of what professional sports franchise?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York Yankees

questions.question: Where did the line, Im not a doctor, but I play one on TV originate from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vicks Formula 44 commercial

questions.question: This newscaster would interrupt his co-anchor and say Jane, you ignorant slut.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dan Aykroyd

questions.question: Which show featured a pathological liar who would say Yeah, thats the ticket whenever he figured out his new lie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Saturday Night Live

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Seinfeld and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, seinfeld. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This Desperate Housewife guest starred in an episode of  Seinfeld, where the debate centered around the nature of her breasts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Teri Hatcher

questions.question: When this actor played himself in the Seinfeld episode The Mom  Pop Store, he bit Kramer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jon Voight

questions.question: This star of Everybody Loves Raymond appeared in the Seinfeld episode The Bottle Deposit as Jerrys obsessive mechanic.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brad Garrett

questions.question: This Malcolm in the Middle star had a recurring role on Seinfeld playing Jerrys dentist, Dr. Tim Whatley.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bryan Cranston

questions.question: What was the name of George and Louise Jeffersons son on the hit television show The Jeffersons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lionel

questions.question: This D-List actress guest starred in several Seinfeld episodes, playing Georges fiancees former college roommate, who launches a one-woman comedy show all about bashing Jerry.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kathy Griffin

questions.question: Which Frasier co-star played a virgin in the classic Seinfeld episode The Contest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jane Leeves

questions.question: Which former New York Mets baseball player played himself in the Seinfeld episode The Boyfriend?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Keith Hernandez

questions.question: What year did the popular CBS show The Jeffersons first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1975

questions.question: Roxie Roker, who played Helen Willis in the popular sitcom The Jeffersons, was the mother of superstar rocker Lenny Kravitz.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: On the smash hit television show The Jeffersons, what was George Jeffersons profession?

options.text: He owned a chain of dry cleaning stores.
He worked in a car wash.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He owned a chain of dry cleaning stores.

questions.question: Which former SNL comedian pretended to be deaf in the Seinfeld episode The Friars Club?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rob Schneider

questions.question: In the Seinfeld episode The Millennium, this Gilmore Girls actress taunts Jerry with his position on her speed dial.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lauren Graham

questions.question: In the episode The Summer of George, this actress plays Jerry Seinfelds girlfriend who is such a high maintenance that Jerry must enlist George to help him handle his relationship.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Amanda Peet

questions.question: This Cheers barfly plays himself in the Seinfeld episode The Trip.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Wendt

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Munsters and Fred Gwynne

questions.question: What was the historical name of the president, portrayed by Martin Sheen, on the TV drama The West Wing?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Josiah Bartlet

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1964

questions.question: According to the Springfield Charter, what past time was discovered to be illegal when researching a case of mail threats?

options.text: Putting squirrels in your pants for the purposes of gambling

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Putting squirrels in your pants for the purposes of gambling

questions.question: The Munsters from the eponymous show had a fire-breathing dragon that lived under their staircase. What was the name of their pet ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Spot

questions.question: On the hit television show The Munsters, this actress played the role of homemaker Lily Munster, who wore goth-style makeup.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yvonne De Carlo

questions.question: On the the TV show The Munsters, Herman Munster, who was portrayed by Fred Gwynne, worked at what funeral home?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gateman, Goodbury  Graves Funeral Home

questions.question: Fred Gwynne and Al Lewis played together in another show, before they appeared on The Munsters.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the name of the Ultimate Behemoths satellite in The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Van Star 1

questions.question: What year did the original series  The Munsters leave the airwaves?

questions.question: What was the middle name of the werewolf Eddie Munster on the television show The Munsters?

questions.question: In The Simpsons, how much does homer pay for Professor Frinks matter transporter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $0.75

questions.question: Who was Homers boss when he moved to Cypress Creek?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hank Scorpio

questions.question: Initially, Marilyn, Hermans niece on the show The Munsters was played by Beverley Owen, who left the show in 1964. What was the name of the actress who replaced her?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pat Priest

questions.question: What was the home address of the Munsters on the self-titled sitcom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1313 Mockingbird Lane

questions.question: Herman, portrayed by Fred Gwynne on The Munsters, once tried out for which professional baseball team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dodgers

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Family Guy and Series

questions.question: What evil contraption did Mr. Burns unleash on Homer, when he tried to get Bart to come back home?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robotic Richard Simmons

questions.question: In the animated TV series Family Guy, Meg is the oldest child of Peter and Lois Griffin.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Homer Simpson dances as a mascot of the Springfield Isotopes to the song Baby Elephant Walk.  Who is the Baby Elephant Walk by?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henry Mancini

questions.question: What year was the animated series Family Guy created?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1999

questions.question: In this episode of Family Guy, when burglars break in, the Griffins become hopelessly trapped in their own panic room, prompting Peter to tell the incredible epic story of his family.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Untitled Griffin Family History

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seth MacFarlane

questions.question: Which Family Guy character got addicted to cocaine?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brian

questions.question: In what power plant sector does Homer Simpson work ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 7-g

questions.question: The catchphrase Freakin Sweet belongs to which Family Guy character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter

questions.question: As revealed in The Day the Violence Died, an episode of The Simpsons, who was the original creator of Itchy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chester J. Lampwick

questions.question: Whose gravestone was in the place, where Homer thought his mother was buried?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walt Whitman

questions.question: Which character from Family Guy uses the phrase You will bow to me?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stewie
